steps.text: The XAI Primer showcases a selection of Explainable Artificial Intelligence artworks from different domains. Projects have been coded and dispayed according to their similarity.
These clusters of projects are visually detached from the others, proving a considerable difference.
While the opposite side of the space is populated by many artworks. The glyph mainly shows how most clusters are blue, indicating a predominance of cases designed for a desktop view.

By zooming in, the individual projects that are part of each cluster appear. Some of them use a multimedial approachh. While some take advantage of a multimedia approach, others tend to stick to the same language.
By zooming in, tactics and media shared by the projects belonging to each cluster pop up, revealing an other layer of information.
These clusters of projects are visually detached from the others.

All of them are addressed to the lay public i.e. users who are not experts in artificial intelligence neither domain experts.

From the interaction standpoint, guided exploration and linear path are shared characteristics.

This group of projects exploits only one type of explanation tactics: the metaphorical narrative.

Indeed, it gathers together two documentaries, one video and one storytelling dissemination website.
Together with metaphorical narrative, explanation by example is another tactic used for explaining AI to lay users.
Interactive Articles as triggers for deductive strategies
These groups of projects are characterized by the use of the same presentation format. In fact, the majority of them are Interactive Articles.
From an interaction standpoint, everyone prefers a linear path and a guided exploration.
Drill down story, Define and Describe, Overview First are the most shared explanation strategies, in combination with visuals.
